name: FetchDeploymentLogs
description:
Retrieve build logs for a specific deployment by ID.

Use this tool to access the build logs or events of a deployment using its deployment ID and build ID. It can stream logs continuously or return them in JSON format based on input parameters.

parameters.name: deployment_identifier_or_hostname
parameters.description: The unique identifier or hostname of the deployment to fetch logs for.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier or hostname of the deployment.

parameters.name: event_order
parameters.description: Specifies the order of returned events by timestamp. Use 'forward' for chronological order or 'backward' for reverse order.

value_schema.description: Order of the returned events based on the timestamp.

parameters.name: enable_live_streaming
parameters.description: Set to '1' to enable live streaming of events as they happen. Use '0' to disable live streaming.

value_schema.description: When enabled, this endpoint will return live events as they happen.

parameters.name: maximum_events_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the max number of events to return. Use `-1` for all available logs.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of events to return. Provide `-1` to return all available logs.

parameters.name: deployment_build_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the deployment build for which logs are to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: Deployment build ID.

parameters.name: start_timestamp_for_logs
parameters.description: Timestamp from which to start retrieving build logs. Provide in milliseconds.

value_schema.description: Timestamp for when build logs should be pulled from.

parameters.name: fetch_until_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp up to which the build logs should be retrieved.

value_schema.description: Timestamp for when the build logs should be pulled up until.

parameters.name: filter_by_status_code
parameters.description: Specify the HTTP status code range to filter deployment events.

value_schema.description: HTTP status code range to filter events by.

parameters.name: build_event_delimiter
parameters.description: Specify the delimiter type for separating logged events. Use '0' for no delimiter and '1' for an alternative separation method.

parameters.name: include_builds
parameters.description: Specify whether to include build events (1) or not (0) in the response.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: Identifies the team on whose behalf the request is performed.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The unique identifier (slug) of the Team for which the request is made. Used to specify the team context.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Order of the returned events based on the timestamp.

value_schema.description: Order of the returned events based on the timestamp.

parameters.name: follow
parameters.description: When enabled, this endpoint will return live events as they happen.

value_schema.description: When enabled, this endpoint will return live events as they happen.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return. Provide `-1` to return all available logs.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of events to return. Provide `-1` to return all available logs.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Deployment build ID.

value_schema.description: Deployment build ID.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Timestamp for when build logs should be pulled from.

value_schema.description: Timestamp for when build logs should be pulled from.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Timestamp for when the build logs should be pulled up until.

value_schema.description: Timestamp for when the build logs should be pulled up until.

parameters.name: statusCode
parameters.description: HTTP status code range to filter events by.

value_schema.description: HTTP status code range to filter events by.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrUrl
parameters.description: The unique identifier or hostname of the deployment.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier or hostname of the deployment.
